long_description: With sweet and vibrant style, the Electra Cruiser Candy bike saddle pops with color and offers a smooth, comfortable ride thanks to large coil springs and a wide platform. Wide saddle base is supported by coil springs, providing shock-absorbing comfort for your ride. Smooth vinyl cover is easy to clean. Standard-sized steel rails fit most adult bicycle seatposts.
short_description: With sweet and vibrant style, the Electra Cruiser Candy bike saddle pops with color and offers a smooth, comfortable ride thanks to large coil springs and a wide platform.
